title: Should 750 rp skins exist?
body: Opinions? Id rather spend a little bit extra for the particle effects. You have to spend 10 to buy it anyhow. And idk if the maruader ashe got black arrows but if she didnt it leaves the skin with a mismatch feeling. Also i feel like debonair galio 750 pricepoint is an excuse to do a half ass job so people will stop complaining about champs who need a new skin instead of giving him interesting skin.
